abilities.name: Loving Touch
abilities.description: Hit rolls of 6+ with Daemonic Claws ignore Heroes' Save.

abilities.name: Fascinating Dance
abilities.description: Slaanesh Daemonettes are free to bypass Heroes.

difficultyBonuses.description: After Daemonette has attacked, they can move up to 2 spaces.

table.name: We wanna see your hands!
table.description: Each daemonette moves and attacks Hero with Daemonic Claws if in range.

table.name: We wanna see your dance!
table.description: Each daemonette moves through the most amount of Heroes they can pass and attacks any of them with Swift Dance.

table.name: Like there is no tomorrow!
table.description: Remove all daemonettes from the group. Set them up at the start of next Adversary Phase anywhere on the board.

table.name: We wanna hear your 'Yeah!'
table.description: Each daemonette moves and attacks Hero with Daemonic Claws if in range. Roll twice many dices, but every successful roll inflicts stun instead.

table.name: No wanna hear your 'No!'
table.description: Each daemonette attacks any adjacent Hero with Swift Dance. Then, each daemonette must move at least half of their movement through different spaces. Then, this group can be activated again.

table.name: Now raise your hands and - let's go!
table.description: Each daemonette attacks Hero with Daemonic Claws if in range. Any daemonette who did not attack can move double distance.
